CustomField.formula: IF(ISNUMBER(Left(Text(Prospect_Status__c),1)), Case(Value(Left(Text(Prospect_Status__c),1)) - Value(Left(Text(Buying_Process__c),1)), 0,'Aligned', 1,'Selling > Buying', 2,'Selling > Buying', 3,'Selling > Buying', 4,'Selling > Buying', -1,'Buying > Selling', -2,'Buying > Selling', -3,'Buying > Selling', -4,'Buying > Selling', 'Missing Information'), IF(TEXT(Prospect_Status__c)='Lost to Competitor', ' ' + TEXT(Prospect_Status__c), IF(TEXT(Prospect_Status__c)='Subscriber', TEXT(Prospect_Status__c), TEXT(Prospect_Status__c))))
CustomField.label: Process Alignment (Text)
